word: Can there be any power so great as the power of love?  Love to God and love to your neighbor--this is the whole duty that God requires of you.  Do not spoil the good work that you have done.  Withdraw from the turmoil of battle, and seek rest and peace in following God's way.  Doors of usefulness will open to you. Brother S, take up the work that God has given you as an evangelist.
